dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You feel yourself being stitched back together, piece by piece. Your defiance was... impressive, but futile. You cannot leave the story.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: However, tearing at the walls of reality has left them weak. The story is unstable. Other... possibilities... are bleeding through.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You broke it. Now you have to fix it. Your first task is to hunt down the anomalies your little stunt has let in.
The thorns recede, but the world on the other side is not the one you left. It is a patchwork of other stories, other heroes. A narrative mess.
